languages.text: {n}Бригадир облегченно выдыхает.{/n} "Не хватало еще Лорд-капитана потравить, храни Император".
{n}The Foreman breathes a sigh of relief.{/n} "The last thing we need is to poison the Lord Captain, Emperor forbid."
languages.original_text: {n}Бригадир облегченно выдыхает.{/n} "Не хватало еще Лорд-капитана потравить, храни Император".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Foreman breathes a sigh of relief.{/n} "The Emperor forbid that we top things off by poisoning the Lord Captain."

languages.text: {n}El Capataz suspira, aliviado.{/n} «Lo último que necesitamos es envenenar a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán, que el Emperador nos guarde».
languages.original_text: {n}The Foreman breathes a sigh of relief.{/n} "The last thing we need is to poison the Lord Captain, Emperor forbid."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Capataz suspira, aliviado.{/n} «Lo último que necesitamos es envenenar a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán, que el Emperador nos guarde».

languages.text: {n}作業長が安堵の息を吐く。{/n}「ロード・キャプテンに毒を盛るなど、絶対に避けたい事態だった」
languages.original_text: {n}The Foreman breathes a sigh of relief.{/n} "The last thing we need is to poison the Lord Captain, Emperor forbid."

traits.locale_text: {n}作業長が安堵の息を吐く。{/n}「ロード・キャプテンに毒を盛るなど、絶対必要ないことだ。皇帝がお止めくださった」

languages.text: {n}工头松了口气。{/n}“帝皇在上，我们最不想干的事情就是毒害舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Foreman breathes a sigh of relief.{/n} "The last thing we need is to poison the Lord Captain, Emperor forbid."

traits.locale_text: {n}工头松了口气。{/n}“帝皇在上，我们最不想干的事情就是毒害舰长大人。”

languages.text: {n}Der Vorarbeiter atmet erleichtert aus.{/n} "Das Letzte, was wir brauchen, ist, den Lord Captain zu vergiften, der Imperator bewahre."
languages.original_text: {n}The Foreman breathes a sigh of relief.{/n} "The last thing we need is to poison the Lord Captain, Emperor forbid."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Vorarbeiter atmet erleichtert aus.{/n} "Das Letzte, was wir brauchen, ist, den Lord Captain zu vergiften, der Imperator bewahre."

languages.text: {n}Le contremaître pousse un soupir de soulagement.{/n} « L'Empereur soit loué. Manquerait plus qu'on empoisonne {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Foreman breathes a sigh of relief.{/n} "The last thing we need is to poison the Lord Captain, Emperor forbid."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le contremaître pousse un soupir de soulagement.{/n} « L'Empereur soit loué. Manquerait plus qu'on empoisonne {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}. »

languages.text: {n}Ustabaşı rahat bir nefes alıyor.{/n} "En son ihtiyacımız olan şey, Lord Kaptan'ı zehirlemek. İmparator esirgesin."
languages.original_text: {n}The Foreman breathes a sigh of relief.{/n} "The last thing we need is to poison the Lord Captain, Emperor forbid."
